Computer.name: #PLAYERNAME# VM(1)
Computer.file:
This is a basic deployment of Hacknet designed by the Will Council. Your current x-server.sys provides basic functionality.
You are able to backup, shutdown, see your IP, connect to your email server, and access a barebones command shell. You also have a few programs on your system under the /bin folder.
However, this meagre set of tools is far from complete. Find a complete x-server.sys. Then find us.
We will be waiting.
222.51.39.138
